content.introduction: Closures are self-contained blocks of code that can be passed around and used in your code.

basicSyntax.title: Basic Syntax
basicSyntax.description: Closures can be written in several forms, from the most verbose to the most concise.

captureLists.title: Capture Lists
captureLists.description: Capture lists help prevent retain cycles by explicitly specifying how to capture values in a closure.
